basic.name: Carnage (Q)
basic.description: Unleash your sword in a targeted direction, continuously dealing damage to enemies caught in its path.

basic.name: Blood Rage (W)
basic.description: Passive: Basic Attacks and abilities cause enemies to bleed. Active: Detonate all bleed effects on enemies, dealing additional damage and healing Qhira for a portion of the damage dealt.

basic.name: Revolving Sweep (E)
basic.description: Attach your sword to the first enemy Hero hit, pulling you to them and spinning you around them for several seconds. Reactivate to send you to their location, dealing damage and stunning them briefly.

heroic.name: Unrelenting Strikes (R)
heroic.description: Rapidly strike in a large area around Qhira, dealing damage and slowing enemies. After several strikes, a final strike deals additional damage and stuns enemies.

heroic.name: Final Strike (R)
heroic.description: After a short delay, strike in a long line, dealing significant damage to all enemies hit. Damage is increased against low health enemies.

trait.name: Grappling Hook (T)
trait.description: Throw a grappling hook that attaches to terrain. Reactivate to pull yourself to the hooked location.
passives: {highlight}Qhira gains an extra charge of grappling hook every 3 takedowns up to 5 times.{/highlight}
{highlight}Grappling Hook recharges 10% faster for every active Blood Rage stack. {/highlight}.

1.name: Maximum Effort
1.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Fatal Wounds
1.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.
1.quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage {highlight}or activate Blood Rage while 3 enemy heroes are at full stack.{/highlight}
rewards: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 150 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds

1.name: Finishing Touch
1.description: When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 20% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
passives: {highlight} Hitting enemies with grappling hook increases Qhira movespeed by 15% for 2 seconds{/highlight}

4.name: Upstage
4.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

4.name: Ensnaring Swing
4.description: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 60% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds
passives: {highlight} Increases Qhira rotating speed on revolving sweep by 200%{/highlight}

4.name: Your Pain, My Gain
4.description: Hitting enemy heroes with basic attacks {highlight}or the grappling hook{/highlight} causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

4.name: Hooked
4.description: {highlight}Grappling hook now targets non-heroic units dealing extra 2000% damage to them, refunds a charge if it kills a non-heroic target.{/highlight}

7.name: The Thirst
7.description: Carnage heals for 50% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes. Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 15% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times

7.name: Healmonger
7.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, {highlight}it heals for an additional 150 Health and 75 more health for other heroes under 50% Health.{/highlight}

7.name: Siphoning Link
7.description: {highlight}Changing prey(Active) : While under Revolving Sweep effect activate to re-cast Revolving Sweep in the target direction, if Qhira hits someone she changes the Revolving Sweep target{/highlight}
passives: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

10.name: Unrelenting Strikes
10.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds

10.name: Final Strike
10.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

13.name: Chainsaw
13.description: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

13.name: Pulsing Pain
13.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 135 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: The Hunted
13.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

16.name: Booming Kick
16.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

16.name: Lingering Ailment
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep or by Grappling Hook have their Armor reduced by 25 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Swing Life Away
16.description: {highlight}For each second Qhira swings around a target she receives 12 spell armor that will expire 5 seconds after re-activates or stop swinging. Hitting enemy heroes with Grappling hook decreases Revolving Sweep cooldown by 3 seconds{/highlight}

20.name: Silent Killer
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for 0.5 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds. {highlight}Decrease unrelenting strikes area by 1 meter{/highlight}

20.name: Unleashed Potential
20.description: {highlight}Casting Final Strike unleashes two additional beams that curve outward, each dealing 50% damage. The beams converge towards the end of the original Final Strike, creating an area of effect that deals 250% of the ultimate damage.{/highlight}

20.name: Utility Belt
20.description: {highlight}Changed functionality: Come over here(Active): While swinging on revolving sweep Qhira pulls the affected target to her{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Grappling hook now stuns targets it hit for 0.25 seconds and hitting terrain refunds half of the hook cooldown.{/highlight}

20.name: No Sanctuary
20.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way. Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.
passives: {highlight}Killing an enemy hero resets grappling hook charges{/highlight}

20.name: Mortal Wounds
20.description: {highlight}Activating Blood rage makes targets with 5 bleed stacks receive 100% more bleed damage for 3 seconds if they move{/highlight}
